name: NATIONAL ELECTRICAL MANUFACTURERS ASSOCIATION (NEMA)
description: NEMA is a trade assoc. representing electrical equipment and medical imaging manufacturers
sampleDescriptions: Issues relevant to electrical manufacturing and equipment, including infrastructure legislation; electrification policy; funding for DOE programs (e.g., the Solid State Lighting program); DOE applianc
